snippet.title: (Steam Release Trailer) Meat Saw
snippet.description:
Amy Chambers, a young woman on her way to the Black Ridge Mountains to meet with her friends for a weekend of camping will soon find that the forest holds more than just a good time for her and her friends. The saw beckons and it must feed. 

Play the game for free when it launches right here! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1897530/Meat_Saw/
